original_title: Valentina Lisitsa - F. Chopin - 24 Etudes for Piano Op.10 , Op 25
overview: For the first time ever the complete set of Chopin's Etudes on Video! See and listen to the work which is justly considered the ultimate in difficulty - both musically and technically - Chopin's 24 Etudes . This is a first opportunity to be able to watch Chopin Etudes from the unique vantage point of performer herself . Never before were the cameras so close up to the red-hot keyboard , following the hands like the pianist's eyes would do . The magnificent sound comes from 1923 Wigmore Hall Boesendorfer Concert Grand Piano.
title: Valentina Lisitsa - F. Chopin - 24 Etudes for Piano Op.10 , Op 25
